metadata.title: CVE-2024-4774 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The `ShmemCharMapHashEntry()` code was susceptible to potentially undefinedbehavior by bypassing the move semantics for one of its data members. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 126.

criterions.comment: mozjs102 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
